full_summary:
Tender Opportunity: Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk
==============================================

Contract Number: cb-9016-72959050
------------------------------------------

### Tender Overview

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is issued under the Product Category 2 - Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products within the Supply Arrangement E60PQ-140003/C. The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) is seeking quotations for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture to the following locations by November 2023:

- Ottawa, Ontario (National Capital Region)
- Toronto, Ontario (Ontario Region)
- Montreal, Quebec (Quebec Region)

### Mandatory Requirements

- The proposed furniture must meet the specifications outlined in the RFP documents.
- The tenders must be submitted by November 2023.
- Quotations are open to all qualified suppliers who hold a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) with Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC).

### Participation Information

This procurement is subject to the Government of Canada's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. Additionally, it is set aside from international trade agreements under the provision for small and minority businesses.

### Tender Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation of quotations will be based on the lowest price as determined by PSPC's evaluation process.

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

Name: Zartash Syed
Email: [Zartash.Syed@osfi-bsif.gc.ca](mailto:Zartash.Syed@osfi-bsif.gc.ca)
Phone: (416) 696-8476
Address: 255 Albert St, 12th Floor, Ottawa, ON K1A 0H2, Canada

The RFP documents can be downloaded from the following locations:

* [RFP 20231009 for Height Adjustable Desks - AMD002](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9016/rfp-20231009-for-height-adjustable-desks---amd002.pdf)
